mapper.insert: insert into STM_SYS_USER_DOMAIN_ROLE_REL (USER_ID, ROLE_ID, DOMAIN_ID) values (#{userId},#{roleId}, #{domainId})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, SEX, ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, USER_TYPE AS userType, MOBILE, EMAIL, STATUS, CREATOR_ID AS creatorId, CREATED_TIME AS createdTime FROM STM_SYS_USER where ID=#{id}
select role.id roleId,OCUSER.id userId from STM_SYS_USER OCUSER,STM_SYS_ROLE role where OCUSER.USER_TYPE=1
select OCUSER.id userId from STM_SYS_USER OCUSER where OCUSER.USER_TYPE=2
select domain.id domainId,role.id roleId from STM_SYS_DOMAIN domain,STM_SYS_ROLE role
select domain.id domainId from STM_SYS_DOMAIN domain
select domain.id domainId,OCUSER.ID userId from STM_SYS_DOMAIN domain,STM_SYS_USER OCUSER WHERE OCUSER.USER_TYPE=1
select domain.id domainId,OCUSER.ID userId from STM_SYS_DOMAIN domain,STM_SYS_USER OCUSER

select RELATION.USER_ID as userId, RELATION.ROLE_ID as roleId, RELATION.DOMAIN_ID as domainId, OCUSER.NAME as userName, OCUSER.ACCOUNT as userAccount, OCUSER.STATUS as userStatus, OCUSER.USER_TYPE as userType, OCDOMAIN.NAME as domainName FROM STM_SYS_USER_DOMAIN_ROLE_REL RELATION LEFT JOIN STM_SYS_USER OCUSER ON RELATION.USER_ID=OCUSER.ID LEFT JOIN STM_SYS_DOMAIN OCDOMAIN ON RELATION.DOMAIN_ID= OCDOMAIN.ID WHERE RELATION.ROLE_ID=#{roleId}

select RELATION.USER_ID as userId, RELATION.ROLE_ID as roleId, RELATION.DOMAIN_ID as domainId, OCDOMAIN.NAME as domainName, OCROLE.NAME as roleName FROM STM_SYS_USER_DOMAIN_ROLE_REL RELATION LEFT JOIN STM_SYS_DOMAIN OCDOMAIN ON RELATION.DOMAIN_ID=OCDOMAIN.ID LEFT JOIN STM_SYS_ROLE OCROLE ON RELATION.ROLE_ID=OCROLE.ID WHERE RELATION.USER_ID=#{userId}

select RELATION.USER_ID as userId, RELATION.ROLE_ID as roleId, RELATION.DOMAIN_ID as domainId, OCUSER.NAME as userName, OCUSER.ACCOUNT as userAccount, OCUSER.STATUS as userStatus, OCUSER.USER_TYPE as userType, ROLE.NAME as roleName FROM STM_SYS_USER_DOMAIN_ROLE_REL RELATION LEFT JOIN STM_SYS_USER OCUSER ON RELATION.USER_ID=OCUSER.ID LEFT JOIN STM_SYS_ROLE ROLE ON RELATION.ROLE_ID= ROLE.ID WHERE RELATION.DOMAIN_ID=#{domainId} AND OCUSER.USER_TYPE=1
AND (OCUSER.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') OR OCUSER.ACCOUNT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%'))
